Cam::

She looked up at Windlord. "I...I wanna talk tot he one who's the big 
boss. I can't just break a promise I made with mommy.  But, well, if 
it will help someone who is sick, and I don't want any one to get 
sick."  She looked down and sighed. "I gotta make sure. If a b ig 
boom happens, then other bots will get hurt." She started to sob,"I 
don't know what to do." She put her small hands over her 
face. "Mommy, what do you want me to do?" as she cried."I don't want 
anybot to be sick. Being sick is no fun. But daddy will be mad if big 
booms happen." she cried. "WAHHHAAAAAAAAAAAA!"
